title: Middlekauff - 3 & Out - Gruden's Gone Soft; Cowboys' Bad Luck; Nick Bosa Injured Again; Preseason Fool's Gold; Middlekauff Mailbag
itunes:title: Middlekauff - 3 & Out - Gruden's Gone Soft; Cowboys' Bad Luck; Nick Bosa Injured Again; Preseason Fool's Gold; Middlekauff Mailbag
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast

https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2

In this episode, Middlekauff gives his takeaways from the first episode of Hard Knocks with Gruden and the Raiders, why the Cowboys have had a bad luck offseason, why Nick Bosa getting injured isn't surprising, what to look for/what to ignore during the preseason, and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to www.theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
